content: @Eric Haas @Michelle (Moseman) Miller we talked a few times about needing a joint PC, OO track at a connectathon to hammer on the newly combined <everything>Request resource. (I don't even know if it has a name yet). That way we can really see if we made the best decision combining referralRequest, procedureRequest, diagnosticRequest into one resource.
Has a track for that been proposed yet? Is there still interest from others in having such a track?

That would be useful. @Danielle Friend are you interested in creating a track and leading it? So far I haven't had any response to this change. Its been only a couple of weeks since I updated the build so maybe nobody is aware. It is still call procedureRequest. I like clnicalRequest but was looking for input from others.....
Sure, I can do that. I will get one submitted by Wednesday!
"Absolutely nothing. Say it again. It ain't nothing but a heart-breaker."
